data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As I near a release for what I originally planned to be
    Crypt::OpenSSL::BN, it has become clear that Crypt::OpenSSL::Bignum
    would be a better name choice, as it is more descriptive, and
    matches the type name of the OpenSSL library. If this request is
    approved, feel free to remove Crypt::OpenSSL::BN if you wish (also
    registered under my PAUSE account).
